languages.text: {n}Бригадиры нашли подход к моторным вандалам, пообещав им снедь, воду и поставки необходимого. В самих аркологиях поползли недовольные шепотки — Вольный Торговец, кажется, награждает за ересь особой милостью!{/n}

{n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бригадиры нашли подход к моторным вандалам, пообещав им снедь, воду и поставки необходимого. В самих аркологиях поползли недовольные шепотки — Вольный Торговец, кажется, награждает за ересь особой милостью!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The brigadiers have found an approach to the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water and supply of other necessities — the approach that would curb the disobedient heretics with food and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to the disgruntled whispers flying around In the arcologies — The Rogue Trader seems to reward heresy with special privileges!{/n}

{n}The brigadiers have found an approach to the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water and supply of other necessities — the approach that would curb the disobedient heretics with food and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to the disgruntled whispers flying around In the arcologies — The Rogue Trader seems to reward heresy with special privileges!{/n}

{n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}

languages.text: {n}领班氏族与引擎破坏者达成了和解，承诺为他们提供食物、水与其他必要补给。这样的决定在巢都内引发了不满的窃窃私语，说行商浪人滥用特权，为异端分子谋利！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}领班氏族与引擎破坏者达成了和解，承诺为他们提供食物、水与其他必要补给。这样的决定在巢都内引发了不满的窃窃私语，说行商浪人滥用特权，为异端分子谋利！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los capataces establecieron un acuerdo mutuo con los Vándalos del Motor prometiéndoles comida, agua y otros suministros necesarios. Esto ha dado lugar a murmullos de descontento por las arcologías: ¡{mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente premia la herejía con privilegios especiales!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los capataces establecieron un acuerdo mutuo con los Vándalos del Motor prometiéndoles comida, agua y otros suministros necesarios. Esto ha dado lugar a murmullos de descontento por las arcologías: ¡{mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente premia la herejía con privilegios especiales!{/n}

languages.text: {n}准将は、エンジン破壊者に食料、水、その他必要な物資を約束し、相互理解の関係を構築した。そのため、ローグトレーダーが特別な権限で異端者に報いていると、不満の声がアークロジーのあちこちで囁かれるようになった...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}准将は、エンジン破壊者に食料、水、その他必要な物資を約束し、相互理解の関係を構築した。そのため、ローグトレーダーが特別な権限で異端者に報いていると、不満の声がアークロジーのあちこちで囁かれるようになった...{/n}
{n}准将は、エンジン破壊者に食料、水、その他必要な物資を約束し、相互理解の関係を構築した。そのため、ローグトレーダーが特別な権限で異端者に報いていると、不満の声がアークロジーのあちこちで囁かれるようになった...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les chefs d'équipe passent un accord avec les Vandales mécaniques en leur promettant de l'eau et de la nourriture, entre autres approvisionnements, et cela donne naissance à des mécontentements au sein des arcologies... Enfin quoi, {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} qui récompense l'hérésie par des privilèges spéciaux !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les chefs d'équipe passent un accord avec les Vandales mécaniques en leur promettant de l'eau et de la nourriture, entre autres approvisionnements, et cela donne naissance à des mécontentements au sein des arcologies... Enfin quoi, {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} qui récompense l'hérésie par des privilèges spéciaux !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Vorarbeiter haben eine Übereinkunft mit den Maschinenvandalen getroffen, indem sie ihnen Lebensmittel, Wasser und andere dringend benötigte Dinge versprochen haben. Das führte zu verärgertem Getuschel in den Arkologien – {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} belohnt Ketzerei durch besondere Privilegien!{/n}

Das führte zu verärgertem Getuschel in den Arkologien — {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} belohnt Ketzerei durch besondere Privilegien!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ustabaşılar; kendilerine yiyecek, su ve daha nice gerekli kaynak sözü vererek Makine Vandalları ile karşılıkla anlaşmaya vardı. Bu hadise, hoşnutsuz fısıltıların arkolojilerin dört bir yanında yankılanmasına yol açtı. Fısıltılarda Hür Tacir'in kâfirliği özel ayrıcalıklarla ödüllendirdiği dile getirildi!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The foremen have established a mutual understanding with the Engine Vandals by promising them food, water, and other necessary supplies. This gave birth to disgruntled whispers flittering throughout the arcologies — the Rogue Trader rewards heresy with special privileges!{/n}
